Register.textWeHaveSentYou: We have sent you a confirmation code to your email and a text message to your phone number.
Register.textYouWillReceive: You will receive the code in less than 5 minutes, check your inbox emails and keep an eye on messages via SMS received on your mobile.
Register.textIfSeveralMinutesHave: If several minutes have passed and you have not received it, check your email in the SPAM section. If you still don't receive it, press the 'back' button and try again.
Register.textByCompletingYourBasic: By completing your basic information you will be able to access to your Uulala App and Card Portal.
Register.textYouCanLoginWith: You can login with the information of the account you just created.
Register.textYourProfileIn: Your profile in Uulala will be linked to this company.
Register.textTheInformationRequested: The information requested is intended to create a user profile and to offer you the best benefits tailored to your needs.

ForgotPassword.textIfYouCantFind: if you can't find it in your received emails, look in the spam section. If the 5 minutes have passed you can resend the code, the previous one will be invalidated.

Licenses.textScanTheFollowingQR: Scan the following QR code from your crypto wallet to make the transfer.
Licenses.textYourNodesWillBe: Your nodes will be updated and you will be notified when the transfer is confirmed.
Licenses.textTheConfirmationTimeCan: The confirmation time can vary from 24 to 72 hours,
Licenses.textDependingOnHowFastTheBlockchain: depending on how fast the blockchain takes and the liquidation of the assets is carried out.
Licenses.textYourLicensesWill: Your licenses will give you access to participate in earning daily rewards points.
Licenses.textDoYouHaveAReferral: Do you have a referral code?
Licenses.textWhoeverReferredYouWill: Whoever referred you will get a bonus and you will receive full benefits,
Licenses.textWithWhichYouWant: with which you want to make the payment.
Licenses.textShownHereAndSaveThe: shown here and save the transfer receipt to validate the transaction.
Licenses.textSubmitAScreenshot: 3. Submit a screenshot of the transfer receipt.
